verbose_text: These observations indicated that silencing CKS1B mediated the activation of the MEK / ERK signaling pathway, as indicated by reduced mRNA and protein expression levels of MEK, ERK, Bcl2, cyclin D1, PCNA, VEGF and bFGF in SO-RB50 and HXO-RB44 cells.
evidence: activation of the MEK/ERK signaling pathway, as indicated by reduced mRNA and protein expression levels of MEK, ERK, Bcl2, cyclin D1, PCNA, VEGF and bFGF
